from sqlalchemy import inspect
from database import engine
inspector = inspect\(engine\)
tables = inspector.get_table_names\(\)
print\(''Tables in database:'', tables\)
")

Bash(PYTHONPATH=./src python -c "
import sys
from dotenv import load_dotenv
load_dotenv\(''./src/.env''\)
sys.path.insert\(0, ''./src''\)

from config import settings
from sqlmodel import SQLModel, Field, Session, create_engine, select
import uuid
from datetime import datetime

# Define User model
class User\(SQLModel, table=True\):
    __tablename__ = ''users''
    id: str = Field\(default_factory=lambda: str\(uuid.uuid4\(\)\), primary_key=True\)
    name: str = Field\(max_length=255\)
    email: str = Field\(unique=True, max_length=255\)
    created_at: datetime = Field\(default_factory=datetime.utcnow\)

# Connect to database
db_url = settings.NEON_DATABASE_URL or settings.DATABASE_URL
print\(f''Database URL: {db_url}''\)

if db_url and db_url.startswith\(''postgresql''\):
    engine = create_engine\(db_url, echo=True\)
    
    # Verify the user exists
    with Session\(engine\) as session:
        from sqlalchemy import text
        result = session.exec\(select\(User\).where\(User.name == ''Suleman''\)\).first\(\)
        
        if result:
            print\(f''[SUCCESS] User Suleman exists in database!''\)
            print\(f''ID: {result.id}''\)
            print\(f''Name: {result.name}''\)
            print\(f''Email: {result.email}''\)
            print\(f''Created: {result.created_at}''\)
        else:
            print\(''[ERROR] User Suleman not found in database''\)
else:
    print\(''Not using PostgreSQL database''\)
")
